pageContent: Background: Survivors of prostate, bladder, and colorectal cancer endure many sexual side-effects of treatment that negatively impact their relationships and diminish their quality of life. Multiple barriers exist in addressing men's sexual concerns in oncological care.

metaData.source:
Outbreak of Pseudomonas aeruginosa infections after transrectal ultrasound-guided prostate biopsy
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/17482933/
